CmdLine: echo "====> Adding Ansible's PPA... <===="  &&     echo "deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/ansible/ansible/ubuntu precise main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ansible.list           &&     echo "deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/ansible/ansible/ubuntu precise main" | tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ansible.list    &&     apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 7BB9C367    &&     apt-get update  &&             echo "====> Installing sudo... <====" &&     apt-get install -y sudo &&             echo "====> Installing python-apt... <====" &&     apt-get install -y python-apt &&             echo "====> Installing Ansible... <===="  &&     apt-get install -y ansible &&             echo "====> Installing Git... <====" &&     apt-get install -y git &&             echo "====> Removing Ansible PPA... <===="  &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*  /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ansible.list
Commands.Name: run
